p: The equilibrium solubility of the two model drugs, SN and DN, was determined in the SNEDDS formulations using the simple shake flask method (Mohsin etÂ al., 2016). The samples were prepared by adding an excess amount of SN and DN to the formulations, which was then thoroughly agitated with a vortex mixer to ensure adequate mixing. Three replicates were taken for each formulation. The samples for the solubility experiments were analyzed using in-house developed UHPLC method by dissolving each of the formulations with an appropriate solvent.
